attributes.action: Provide Free Transport to Schools for Post-16 Students
attributes.additional_details: The Government have the opportunity to enable 16-18 year olds from all backgrounds to access higher education which may be less tenable for people of low income households having serious implications on their education.
attributes.background: Enable those 16-18 to obtain bus passes and travel free of charge on school buses as is current for 11-16 year olds. As the education mandate is now 18 years of age, access to these facilities should be provided as standard, especially where these services are already in place.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590548
